import React from "react"; import {Button} from "@nextui-org/react"; import {Link, useLocation} from "react-router-dom"; const Register: React.FC = () => { const inputClass = "w-full border rounded p-2" const location = useLocation(); return (
Register | Login

{location.pathname === "/register" ? "Enter your email and password to register." : "Enter your username and password to login."}

{location.pathname === "/login" && <> } {location.pathname === "/register" && <> }

{location.pathname === "/register" ? "Or register with" : "Or login with"}

); }; export default Register;
